  • Method Details

    • moveCurrentPlayerToSpace

      public void moveCurrentPlayerToSpace​(@NotNull @NotNull Space space)
      This is just some dummy controller operation to make a simple move to see something happening on the board. This method should eventually be deleted!
      Parameters:
      space - the space to which the current player should move

    • startProgrammingPhase

      public void startProgrammingPhase()
      This method begins the PROGRAMMING phase of the game random Command Cards are assigned to all players in the game

    • finishProgrammingPhase

      public void finishProgrammingPhase()
      Method ends Programming Phase and sets Phase to Activation

    • executePrograms

      public void executePrograms()
      Method sets stepMode to false All registers are executed

    • executeStep

      public void executeStep()
      StepMode is activated Registers are exectued step-by-step

    • executeCommandOptionAndContinue

      public void executeCommandOptionAndContinue​(@NotNull @NotNull Command option)
      When the game is in INTERACTION Phase The phase is set to ACTIVATION and the current player's CommandCard is executed - the turn moves on to the next player, til all steps are executed

      After all steps are executed, the game Phase returns to PROGRAMMING Phase

      Parameters:
      option - option of Command

    • moveToSpace

      public void moveToSpace​(@NotNull @NotNull Player player, @NotNull @NotNull Space space, @NotNull @NotNull Heading heading) throws ImpossibleMoveException
      Throws:
      ImpossibleMoveException

    • moveForward

      public void moveForward​(@NotNull @NotNull Player player)
      Method moves player to 'Neighbour' / one space forward
      Parameters:
      player - to be moved

    • fastForward

      public void fastForward​(@NotNull @NotNull Player player)
      Method moves player two spaces forward
      Parameters:
      player - to be moved

    • turnRight

      public void turnRight​(@NotNull @NotNull Player player)
      Method turns player to the right of the current 'Heading' / facing
      Parameters:
      player - to be turned

    • turnLeft

      public void turnLeft​(@NotNull @NotNull Player player)
      Method turns player to the left of the current 'Heading' / facing
      Parameters:
      player - to be turned

    • moveCards

      public boolean moveCards​(@NotNull @NotNull CommandCardField source, @NotNull @NotNull CommandCardField target)
      Parameters:
      source - Card, which is picked
      target - Card, which is moved to CommandCard Field -to be executed during ACTIVATION phase
      Returns:
      boolean

    • notImplemented

      public void notImplemented()
      A method called when no corresponding controller operation is implemented yet. This should eventually be removed.

    • onZero

      public void onZero()

    • wallBlocks

      public boolean wallBlocks​(Player player, Space space)
      This method checks if the space, that a given player is about to move to, is blocked by a wall The space of the player is compared to the given space
      Parameters:
      player - Player player who wants to move
      space - Space space that player wants to move to
      Returns:
      Boolean true if there is a wall blocking
